member.summary: Generate image for specified HTML file or URL and write resulting image to output file
member.param: path to HTML file or absolute URL
resulting image format (see ). If imageFormat=null format is suggested by output file extension.

member.name: P:NReco.ImageGenerator.HtmlToImageConverter.ToolPath
member.summary: Get or set path where WkHtmlToImage tool is located
member.remarks: By default this property initialized with application assemblies folder. If WkHtmlToImage tool file is not present it is extracted automatically from DLL resources.

member.name: P:NReco.ImageGenerator.HtmlToImageConverter.WkHtmlToImageExeName
member.summary: Get or set WkHtmlToImage tool executive file name ('wkhtmltoimage.exe' by default)

member.name: P:NReco.ImageGenerator.HtmlToImageConverter.Zoom
member.summary: Get or set zoom factor

member.name: P:NReco.ImageGenerator.HtmlToImageConverter.Width
member.summary: Get or set minimum image width

member.name: P:NReco.ImageGenerator.HtmlToImageConverter.Height
member.summary: Get or set minimum image height (default 0: in this case height is calculated automatically)

member.name: P:NReco.ImageGenerator.HtmlToImageConverter.CustomArgs
member.summary: Get or set custom WkHtmlToImage command line arguments

member.name: P:NReco.ImageGenerator.HtmlToImageConverter.ProcessPriority
member.summary: Get or set WkHtmlToImage process priority (Normal by default)

member.name: P:NReco.ImageGenerator.HtmlToImageConverter.ExecutionTimeout
member.summary: Get or set maximum execution time for running WkHtmlToImage process (null is by default = no timeout)

member.name: E:NReco.ImageGenerator.HtmlToImageConverter.LogReceived
member.summary: Occurs when log line is received from WkHtmlToImage process.
member.remarks: Quiet mode should be disabled if you want to get wkhtmltopdf info/debug messages

member.name: T:NReco.ImageGenerator.WkHtmlToImageException
member.summary: The exception that is thrown when WkHtmlToImage process returns non-zero error exit code
